name: quora_scrape_question
description: Scrape a Quora question page. Returns the question, answer count, top answers with authors, upvotes, and content.

steps.code: const questionEl = document.querySelector('[class*="question_text"], [class*="Question"] span, h1'); const answerCountEl = document.querySelector('[class*="answer-count"], [class*="AnswerCount"]'); const answers = []; const answerEls = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="Answer"], [class*="answer"][class*="base"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(answerEls.length, 10); i++) { const el = answerEls[i]; const authorEl = el.querySelector('[class*="user"] a, [class*="author"] a, a[class*="name"]'); const credentialEl = el.querySelector('[class*="credential"], [class*="description"]'); const contentEl = el.querySelector('[class*="inline"], [class*="answer-content"], [class*="formatted_q_text"]'); const upvotesEl = el.querySelector('[class*="upvote"] [class*="count"], [class*="VoteButton"]'); const dateEl = el.querySelector('[class*="date"], time, a[href*="/answer/"]'); answers.push({ author: authorEl ? authorEl.textContent.trim() : '', credential: credentialEl ? credentialEl.textContent.trim() : '', content: contentEl ? contentEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 1500) : '', upvotes: upvotesEl ? upvotesEl.textContent.trim() : '', date: dateEl ? dateEl.textContent.trim() : '' }); } const relatedQuestions = []; document.querySelectorAll('[class*="related"] a, [class*="Related"] a').forEach(function(el) { const text = el.textContent.trim(); if (text.length > 10 && text.length < 200) relatedQuestions.push(text); }); return { question: questionEl ? questionEl.textContent.trim() : '', answer_count: answerCountEl ? answerCountEl.textContent.trim() : '', answers: answers, related_questions: relatedQuestions.slice(0, 10), url: window.location.href }
